Name: Andreas Fasbender
Comment: I was considering moving to WebFlow - until yesterday - as I really like the solution pricing and results. For me (sitting in Germany) lack of multilingual support is nothing less than a showstopper. And no I do not consider using a 3PP like Weglot or Bablic for this as the "all-out-of-one-hand" concept of WebFlow is one of its key benefits.
